sentence.Network_en: I caught the thief flagrante delicto.
The swindler had been caught in flagrante delicto.

list.abs: Obligatio quasi ex contractu 准契约之债Obligatio quasi ex delicto 准私犯之债Obligatio in solidum 连带之债
flagrant 非常的flagrante delicto 现行犯的flagrantly 千真万确地
flagrante delicto , criminal arrested., 被当场捉住的罪犯.
Obligatio ex contractu 契约之债Obligatio ex delicto 私犯之债Obligatio ex variis causarum figuris 其他原因之债.
receiver 隐匿(赃物),窝赃in flagrante delicto 在作案现场with malice aforethought 预谋不轨

auth_sentence.content: Impossible to secure convictions against people unless caught in flagrante delicto.
auth_sentence.res_content: Impossible to secure convictions against people unless caught in flagrante delicto.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Impossible to secure convictions against people unless caught in flagrante delicto.

auth_sentence.content: His cringing wife and the imaginary lover he had always sworn to catch in flagrante delicto.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: His cringing wife and the imaginary lover he had always sworn to catch in flagrante delicto.
